Marvel Rivals Server Connection Failed error: Possible fixes and reasons Discuss Now Marvel Rivals Server Connection Failed details explored (Image via NetEase Games) Marvel Rivals recently received its first seasonal update and will likely plague some users with the Server Connection Failed error. Such problems are quite common for online multiplayer titles. However, the new patch is available for download and you can install it on your systems through the game client.
Marvel Rivals Server Connection Failed error can hinder the community's overall gameplay experience. This is primarily because the error can completely lock out users from the game and even deny access to browse the new gameplay content. This also means you cannot queue up for any matches as the connection failure would stop you before the main menu.
We highlight the possible fixes and reasons for the Marvel Rivals Server Connection Failed error.
Trending Note: The potential solutions provided herein are not guaranteed to work for every user.

Possible fixes Marvel Rivals Server Connection Failed error Here's a list workarounds you can try to fix the Marvel Rivals Server Connection Failed error:
Check for updates Check the game client for any pending updates for the hero shooter. The client can cause server connection issues if the game version encounters a mismatch with the official servers. This is an important step to complete as you would need to have all your game files updated to be able to play Rivals.
Expand Tweet Also read: MR Season 1 Roadmap brings three new maps and more
Restart router The server connection failures generally indicate there could be an issue with your network connection. Try running a few checks on your internet to check for any discrepancies. Also, try restarting the network router to establish a fresh connection. This step usually solves underlying internet problems and can solve server connection errors.
Server downtime Marvel Rivals could also have a server downtime so it is best to check the official X page for any such updates. In case the official servers are under maintenance, wait till the developers get them back online. Meanwhile, keep retrying to get into the game by rebooting it from the game client.
